sec.div: 2.5. Effect of the Interventions on TC, TG, LDL-C, HDL-C and VLDL Levels
sec.p: H 2O 2 increases the total cholesterol, LDL-C, TG and VLDL and decreases HDL-C, whereas in groups that received Argan oil or Argan oil with essential oil of Syzygium aromaticum, there was no significant change in these parameters ( Figure 3).
